definitions.definition: To say or write (something) using particular words; to phrase (something).
definitions.example: Iâ€™m not sure how to word this letter to the council.

definitions.definition: To flatter with words, to cajole.
To ply or overpower with words.
To speak, to use words; to converse, to discourse.
A choice of words and the style in which they are used in a given context.
